FuncDef: Re-authentication for IPoE sessions enable dynamic policy changes.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the min number of days between two non-forced authentications for IPoE sessions. Values-0 to 365.
Specifies the min number of hours between two non-forced authentications for IPoE sessions. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the min number of minutes between two non-forced authentications for IPoE sessions. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the min number of seconds between two non-forced authentications for IPoE sessions. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies that non-forced re-authentications for IPoE sessions is not performed.
